content: After a brief interlude, Caesar decided to join the army once again and left Rome. While he was sailing across the sea, a group of pirates kidnapped him.
translations: ita:Dopo una breve pausa, Cesare decise di rientrare nell'esercito e lasciÃ² Roma. Mentre viaggiava per mare, fu rapito da un
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
